Reviews.Content: This camera is small and efficient and makes it easy for me to take good pictures. I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Think about it!
Reviews.Author: Montenegrin
Reviews.Content: I bought this item in 2011 and after few years having it, I can say that next time my choice is to be one with Li/ion rechargeable battery. Digital camera battery door was damaged after few months and there was no way to replace it, therefore I had to use adhesive tape to keep broken parts together. There were also some problems with flash and many times I had to repeat the same photo again and again in order to get the clear one even it has been set on auto mode. Generally it's not bad but I expected more!

Reviews.Title: I love every thing about it.
Reviews.Author: lilikoikalani "chiffonpiekitty"
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, especially for someone who is not naturally technologically gifted!  Takes great pics.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: bad...
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Basulto
Reviews.Content: The camera came with the lid broken, I had to devise a mechanism so that the batteries do not go out of his place ...

Reviews.Title: I love my camera!!
Reviews.Author: john pendergast
Reviews.Content: This little guy is so small that I take it everywhere.If I see wild weather - I take a picture.If I see a celebrity - I take a picture.Awesome dinner - picture.So easy to use and so easy to post photos online afterward.  Excellent quality and focus.  Love the auto flash function.Way better quality than a cell phone pic too.  I would buy this product again.  Great value.I had mine delivered next day, right to my door and I started taking pictures right away.

Reviews.Title: Okay Camera
Reviews.Author: JulianaSchlecht
Reviews.Content: I like the color of this camera but what I don't like about it was the battery door broke and now I have to use tape to hold it in place. The video recording is okay I don't like how it doesn't auto focus on things. It take okay pictures.

Reviews.Title: Long term let down
Reviews.Author: LMcKeon
Reviews.Content: I have written an initial review and wanted to express my dissatisfaction again with this camera. I have used the camera only a few times ( last time I used this camera was 4 mos. ago).  I bought this camera one year ago.I know that any sort of warranty has expired but I would like to forewarn any other buyers to avoid this seller or be careful when purchasing used items on amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I was a bit sceptical when reading the other reviews about the battery cover breaking but I have found it to be fine. This camera has been around the US and the world and has taken some abuse. It takes great pictures has pretty good software and stands up to regular wear and tear. The one feature that I really do like is that it takes regular old aa batteries. So you can always have a fully charged camera. It replaced a cannon that was always telling me it had to be charged even after I replaced the rechargable battery with a new one.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOL PIX L 24 14 MP Camera
Reviews.Author: gcs
Reviews.Content: I love the NIKON COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera  the shots are great, the camera is easy to operate and the price was great also

Reviews.Title: An Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: WNC 57
Reviews.Content: The more I use this camera and learn about all the functions it has and how to use it I am impressed.  Very reasonably priced and works well.  One of the main features is it uses batteries instead of chargeable battery which makes it handy.  When the battery dies, just change it and you're back in business.

Reviews.Title: Camera wonderful, battery door latch terrible
Reviews.Author: Berengaria N
Reviews.Content: Took advice from camera experts as a Digital camera novice and have been very pleased with this on the whole. Pretty easy to use, lightweight cute little camera with very clear photos, way better results than I ever used to get on any other camera. Discreet also, the size of your palm, so you can take people photos quickly, snapping without the subject realizing they are being photographed. Was advised that if battery door left closed permanently, the batteries would trickle discharge, which I felt was a nuisance - what other device requires this? At the price for the special lithium ones I was certainly keen to retain any battery life possible, especially as on one occasion in heavy tourist mode I used up a pair in one day. To me this type of battery is not particularly easy to find and varies greatly in cost so equally don't want to be obliged to carry masses of spares on holiday. Not totally straightforward on whether you can suppress the flash function but it can take pretty good photos in low light situations in compensation. Seems currently to be slower at finally focusing than it used to be but handy dandy overall  - EXCEPT, as many others have said here, BE WARNED - a couple of months after purchase the door flew open and the batteries dropped out - the catch has to be the flimsiest in the world against formidable pressure from the batteries - I now keep it closed with a heavy duty rubber band but it really is a nuisance because clearly it is a major DESIGN FAULT and should be be fully addressed by Nikon, who should not expect everyone affected to pay through the nose for a "repair".

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: patricia
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA, ITE M EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED & SAVE ME A GOOD DEAL OF MONEY.  WHEN I RECEIVED CAMERA I HAD IT CHECKED OUT BY LOCAL CAMERA SHOP, PASSED WITH FLYING COLORS & I'VE BEEN TAKING GREAT PICTURES EVER SINCE

Reviews.Title: Low Quality
Reviews.Author: LabRat
Reviews.Content: This camera is plasticy. It is much lighter than I expected and feels like a toy camera.  The pictures are not so great, and I am not very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Stephens "Winglesservant"
Reviews.Content: Gave it away as a gift to my interpreter and missionary friend in Tanzania Africa. The pictures he sent back were awesome. He was extremely impressed with the ease of use and the quality of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: i had to have this red one
Reviews.Author: weslyn hoekstra
Reviews.Content: I still love it.  I got a new nikon, but it is having problems so I am still using this one,  These are good affordable cameras; tough enough to survive dropping, enough so that I felt comfortable in getting one for a six-year-old.  good enough quality in the pictures.  fits in my pocket easily.  not the fastest.  good macro but not great.  good low light pictures.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: Gary E. Hays "BigPoppaG"
Reviews.Content: I love the Nikon Coolpix. This is the second one I've owned. First one just died from old age. Plus it was time to upgrade and I will always stick with NIKON! Even bought one for my wife.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BNUY
Reviews.Author: Josephine Zloty
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon, my granddaughter dropped my first one.  I like the idea of AA batteries, I just keep spare batteries in my carrying case, and when they go I just replace them.  In fact I bought another Nikon for my daughtet-in-law, SHE LOVES IT..

Reviews.Title: Bought it as a gift - receiver hates it!
Reviews.Author: Dan S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother for a Christmas present.  She desperately wanted a camera.  One year later, she absolutely hates it and actually holds it against me!  She complains about the camera every chance she gets - and it's easy to see why.  The battery door does not stay closed, so the batteries will fly out mid-use and cause the camera to shut off (obviously).  The flash settings are not user friendly.  Occasionally, the camera just refuses to fire, and I cannot figure out why.The experience with this camera is so incredibly bad that I am very unlikely to purchase another Nikon.  As for buying another camera for my mother, well..... now I'm a bit camera shy!

Reviews.Title: Ditto on the battery door problem
Reviews.Author: Amusante
Reviews.Content: I bought he L22 12 MP just over two years ago. The battery door started weakening after 18 months and broke completely two months ago. I know it's a relatively inexpensive camera, but to spend $120 and have it useless after only 26 months is very disappointing. It's a really decent camera for the price, but one tiny broken piece of metal (?) took it down.

Reviews.Title: I've tried to love it but I can't.
Reviews.Author: Big time Disney fan.
Reviews.Content: The good news is that I have had no problems with the battery door. However the camera has terrible low light capabilities so I get blurred photos where my old Kodak point and shoot would have got them ok.  I, m going to try my luck with a Cannon PowerShot instead as my keep in pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: still own it
Reviews.Author: meb
Reviews.Content: I have a problem with digital. seems they always break.  Last one (I still use sometimes ) the battery lock broke and I have to tape the battery cover shut or they fall out.  so funny,  All these digitals do seem to eat up batteries so I found Aldi has really cheap batteries and they are compatible with the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was Looking for~!
Reviews.Author: J. Fratus "Jamie"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful...simple, easy-to-use! Needed a camera for basic needs, don't need to worry about focus or film~My 10 year old uses it with ease and downloads fast and clear.

Reviews.Title: my camera
Reviews.Author: cat
Reviews.Content: Nikon is a well known product name and that's primarily why I chose this camera. It turns out it's easy to use, fun to see those pics come to life. I love the bigger screen and it's touch. It arrived in good time in new condition and works just wonderfully well. Would buy it again..

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Norris
Reviews.Content: This thing works well and even my wife can figure it out.  And it is a pretty color on top of everything.

Reviews.Title: Nikon used to be the best now the worst
Reviews.Author: Michael H. Shimanek
Reviews.Content: I've bought several Nikon cameras over the years but will never buy another. I just bought one in late July and it started failing this week in Nov. They have the audacity to charge me shipping to get it fixed and I can't send it to Amazon because I'm outside of their guarantee window. Buy anything but Nikon from now on, they must have fired all of their excellent engineers and technicians in Japan and sent manufaturing to some imcompetents in china.

Reviews.Title: dont work
Reviews.Author: mary shafer
Reviews.Content: this product don't work. it can take like 1 or 2 pic. i bought a card for it but something is missing from the camera that allows the card to stay in.. so it is a total waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPIx L24
Reviews.Author: Kirk Chastain
Reviews.Content: The camera looked brand new and it was refurbished.  I received the camera in a matter of just a few days.  I was totally satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: laVoceCarolina
Reviews.Content: This camera is very user friendly and its pics are outstanding.  It is compact and constructed of tough material.  I do not hesitate to recommend the Nikon and the gentleman who sold it to me.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: James E. Waggoner Sr.
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before purchasing my Nikon L24 at our local Bi-Mart on sale for $79 plus a $4 for a memory card.  I use this camera for shooting portraits (not professionally) and product photography of items I list on eBay and CL.  I use this camera almost every day, The users manual is very helpful.  I have also changed out the cheap batteries I use about six times.  After reading about all the trouble other had with the battery compartment cover I spent a little time figuring out how it works.  It is very simple and works just fine.  Anything will break if you force it in a way it ain't suppose to go.  I say, buy the camera, spend a minute or two playing gently with the battery cover and enjoy your purchase. I've had this camera for a about two months  It's a lot of camera for $79.

Reviews.Title: SWEET!
Reviews.Author: Brookescooks
Reviews.Content: Super surprised by the amazingly fast arrival and as good as brand new! even had batteries and a memory card already installed

Reviews.Title: great purchase!!
Reviews.Author: megs
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned that this might not be very good since the price was so cheap, but it is a great camera!!  takes excellent crisp clear pictures and it arrived ahead of schedule!!  :)

Reviews.Title: Defective and get run around.
Reviews.Author: ken burke
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for one reason, to take on vacation. I purchased on Aug 1 and did not even remove from box till I arrived in Jamacia Sept 3. I opened box on tour bus loaded battery and it would not even turn on. I put it back in box and brought it back from vacation. I called they said sorry it's over 30 days old "are you kidding me" it was defective on Aug 1 when purchaced. Im still tring to get what i paid for, a working camara. "VERY POOR CUSTOMER SUPPORT"

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x NIKKOR Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD (Red)
Reviews.Author: Trina H
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x NIKKOR Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD (Red) This camera looks great. I love the color and the price is reasonable. I would recommend this merchandise

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: hunnybunny2005
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago and if you don't hold it completely still it is a blur. Also you can press the capture button and sometimes it doesn't take the picture. A few weeks ago the battery door broke at the hinge ande the batteries fall out, which is terrible since it drains batteries so quick. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for slow/still images
Reviews.Author: Katelyn
Reviews.Content: This camera worked well for what I had bought it for - to take pictures of my jewelry to sell online.However when trying to take a "quick pic" of friends (or anything really) it does take a while to focus in and actually take the picture.Overall, I give it four out of five stars, subtracting one star for the slowness.

Reviews.Title: unreliable focus
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: Bought this after buying several L22 coolpix cameras for use in field work.  L22's have been reliable workhorses.  L24 is consistently unreliable in getting focused.  We photograph soil cores we take from the ground and consistently find blurred out of focus images.  holding the camera fixed, with cores on the ground they are still out of focus.  Using macro mode sometimes works but unpredictably.  Roughly 30% of pix are out of focus (and difficult to tell on the screen in the field).Surprising and disappointing considering we thought the only difference was the resolution compared to L22.Looking elsewhere for replacements.

Reviews.Title: second one i have bought in a year and battery door is broken again!
Reviews.Author: adurgin
Reviews.Content: This is the second one of this particular model I have owned. The first one I bought took great daylight pictures and I loved some of the features. It takes really poor indoor or night pictures if you are not super careful. You end up shooting the same thing many times to get a good one. Also the battery door will break SO EASILY! If you barely bump it, even in a hard case, it will break. Thats what this one did. highly disappointing because I really like this camera. I am not buying another Nikon until they fix the battery door!

Reviews.Title: Broken out of the box.
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: All I needed was a point-and-shoot, nothing fancy but something that works. I am young and this is my first camera purchase, right out of the box it was broken. It simply would not power on even with fresh batteries. NIKON gave practically no support at all and left me frustrated. I cannot recommend this simply because I never even got to take a picture with it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L24 battery door latch is defective AGAIN!
Reviews.Author: Jsophjr "4nov06"
Reviews.Content: About 30 days after purchase, the battery door latch on this camera broke.  The camera was not dropped, or abused in any way.  I sent it to the California repair facility where they said I had dropped  it and caused the latch to break.  I got the Nikon rep on the phone and asked her to inspect the camera and show me any scratch or evidence it had been dropped.  She came back and said she had looked at it and found no issue.  They then agreed to fix it free.  I got it back with a new case.  Now its 3 months later.  I have been super careful when installing batteries and memory cards, but alas, the latch has snapped off again rendering the camera useless.  (For info, I had a Nikon 4 MP camera for years that never failed, so I know how to use one)  The battery spring pressure is just too much for the latch on the battery door and this is why they fail.  The camera is engineered wrong with excessive battery door pressure causing the simple plastic latch to break.  CAVEAT EMPTOR:  BUYER BEWARE, DO NOT PURCHASE THIS MODEL.  Now, I'm off to fight with Nikon again, as I am still within the 1 yr. warranty period.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - when it actually works
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: The battery door broke TWICE in less than a year. And, both times when I sent it in to be replaced via the warranty, they claimed it was because of impact damage. I never drop my camera. If I did drop it, it was on carpet. The first time, after reevaluation, they did repair it for free. The 2nd time, well it's currently under reevaluation.And, the 2nd time, not only did the battery door break again, but the lense itself stopped working. It's stuck in the open, out position, and will not close. I tried changing 3 pairs of brand new batteries so it had nothing to do with power.'I will say that I really do like this camera when it's not broken. It takes beautiful pictures and is easy to use, not complicated, good for someone like me who just wants a nice camera that's not very expensive. I suppose I get what I pay for.

Reviews.Title: it stopped working before a year was up
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Clifton "Bet"
Reviews.Content: we loved this camera while it worked.  it took great pics and was easy to use.  but it just stopped working after about 9 months. i communicated w/ support and they told me to send it back and they would look at it. that is just a pain for me so i did not send it back.  just makes me sad!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: William Fan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model about a year ago, I recently gave it to my uncle because he has been using the same digital camera for over 10 years, then purchased the same model again.The pictures turn out really nice.  The quick access button to adjust exposure is something that other brands do not offer, it is really helpful in dark and very bright situations.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD
Reviews.Author: P. Carson
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Coolpix L-24 for my son's boot camp graduation. Not even owned a month took very few pics and it started.. The battery compartment would spring open and batteries would fly out.. After reading reviews and seeing how common this was I figured the company has to do right and fix since it's obviously a flaw in their camera. Sent camera in and got notice today that it will cost me $56 to have it fixed..I don't think so..called company and now they are reviewing my case.. So I will update but I'm not paying to have a camera fixed that obviously it's a flaw on the companies part so hopefully I get word they will fix at their expense. My suggestion don't buy not worth the hassle and really pisses me off that duct tape seems to be the new accessory for my 1 month old camera!

Reviews.Title: Good features, but weak battery door is a problem.
Reviews.Author: hobbstw
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these cameras to use in my class. has great features that I needed but, after a few weeks of use both cameras battery doors broke. Still usable with tape, this would not be as big of deal if you also did not have to open the door for both camera card and battery replacement.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: JamaicanDoll989
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, this is my first camera from Nikon and I must say it is pretty cool. If you want a camera this is the one for you!!!

Reviews.Title: repeat customer disappointed
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth B. Rodman
Reviews.Content: OK - so I ordered one of these cameras years ago (an earlier version), and loved it for a long time, until one day it just stopped working and the screen was covered with funny lines.  After seeking tech help from the company, it was determined that It would have cost more to fix than buying a new one. So...I took a chance and ordered the same kind (slightly newer version).  OK, so this one I have only had for 4 months, and it is already doing what the other one did.  Appears to be completely non-functional.  Sometimes it does not turn on at all, and when it does, I get a message that the battery is dead, even when it has brand new batteries.  OR....it makes a funny whirring sound, and then I get a greyish screen with horizontal lines across it.  Tried cleaning the battery contacts - to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera thinking it would be great, with a name like nikon. Picture quality isn't all its cracked up to be. My 7mp kodak takes much clearer pictures. Also not sure if its my memory card or this camera, but a good chunk of photos are not taken in jpeg format thus leaving them unable to be uploaded to most websites for sharing.

Reviews.Title: Worked only 5 minutes
Reviews.Author: Guiza
Reviews.Content: I`ve bought this camera confident that Nikon is a good brand besides the price. Unfortunately the camera work only for five minutes, i don`t know what happened but I couldn`t return it because I travelled back to Brazil.

Reviews.Title: Adequate
Reviews.Author: Carey L.
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice small and compact and has a few useful features. It's also quite simple to use and get a hang of. I used it for a bit before I gave it to my mom. She hasn't complained so I guess she's happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Can't take pictures without batteries in place
Reviews.Author: D. Martin "Theatre junky"
Reviews.Content: The cover to the battery compartment on the bottom of the camera pops open. In order to take pictures you have to hold that cover closed so the batteries will not pop out. Probably a design issue, but the latch may also be faulty. Causes the camera to be difficult to use. IF the batteries would stay in the camera would be fine.

Reviews.Title: coolpix L24
Reviews.Author: dominik
Reviews.Content: it is slow, blurry and it doesnt take good quality pictures. I thought it would be a good camera since its nikkon but i was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Florida Snow Bird
Reviews.Author: Charles J. Cassidy "Packer Backer"
Reviews.Content: Great Value camera, first Nikon, and I love it. Sunset pixs on waterare great! Indoor pixs with flash are great also and the speed of the cameradoesn't require a flash a lot of the times.

Reviews.Title: "I GOT WHAT I PAID FOR"
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This camera can take some good pictures, but not all the time. I have missed some good photo opertunities. I took pictures of the fireworks on the 4th of July and they turned out good. I have trouble getting action pictures unless it is on the continuous picture mode. I am not sure if any other camera for the price is going to be any better. I think maybe I should have paid more and gotten a better camera. This is our 2nd cool pics camera. The 1st one lasted almost 1 year.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L24
Reviews.Author: Pet fan
Reviews.Content: This is the crappiest camera.  After having it a short time the compartment where the batteries go didn't lock and the I had to use tape to keep it closed.  I will never buy a Nikon again.

Reviews.Title: ONLY good outdoors with natural light
Reviews.Author: Jenchem
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in this camera.  Cheap, yes, but a Nikon should still take good pictures.  If you are outside or even inside with PLENTY of natural light, it's fine.  But if you are in an even remotely low light situation, the pictures are extremely blurry.  As far as I can tell this is because the flash doesn't flash in all low light situations AND there is no "switch" to force the flash.  You can toggle between auto flash and no flash.  If you only want a cheapo camera to take to the beach or hiking, then it's fine.  But if you want to try to take good pictures indoors of your kiddos, it's trash.  Save your money and buy something better.  I ended up giving up and going back to my 7 year old minolta.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Pictures!
Reviews.Author: Sus1024
Reviews.Content: The quality of photos are horrible and not to mention the long delay when taking a photo.  I called Amazon and complained about the blurry photos and they asked that I contact Nikon directly to see if there is anything I can do to fix it first... they told me to reset the settings and it should be all good... not so much.  The camera also looks and feels cheap.  Just returned it and bought a Canon Powershot Elph and I absolutely love it.I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and good!
Reviews.Author: Dauro L. Dorea
Reviews.Content: Despite the reasonable price of this camera, it has excelent features such as timer, "smile shooter" and others.  Very good quality photos and the camera overall is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Nicoled5d8
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price! It has many different modes to choose from to get the perfect picture.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: JimR
Reviews.Content: I have been a Nikon fan ever since getting my first 35mm SLR (I still have it!) WAY back when....when I was 15 and trust me, that was back when wide lapels were in style!!  Anyway, I have since bought a Coolpix several years ago which has performed flawlessly but wanted to get one of the newer, slimmer models and decided on this.  So far, it has not taken very quality images, most are out of focus that I have taken very similarly with the older Coolpix with no problems and were very clear.  I don't know if this is a one-off problem or just what the deal is but this camera has been a disappointment.  I'll look further into it and maybe I missed something but I doubt it...

Reviews.Title: Broken within three months
Reviews.Author: Keziah
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift, and within three months, it was broken. Contacted Nikon about their warranty and was told the battery cover was not covered.  It would cost me $75 to fix it.  Customer service heavily implied that I must have dropped it or mishandled it in some way.  Interesting that the last two cameras I've owned are still functioning...I decided to upgrade and passed the old cameras onto my teenaged brother and my nine-year-old godson.(If a 5-year-old camera can survive a 9-year-old for three months, why can't this one survive three months of gentle use by an adult??)  Instead of paying to fix it, I bought a new, non-Nikon camera.  Don't waste your money on a this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great  Camera
Reviews.Author: Carole B
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera!  It is easy, and it takes great pictures. My L18 was lost and I bought a Nikon L24 which was horrible to replace it.  Lucky I found this camera on Amazon as it is my favorite camera.

Reviews.Title: greart
Reviews.Author: fedrion
Reviews.Content: good shape as advertised took  great pic with it over Christmas exactly what i need in a camera everthing was in the box all hard ware and shoft ware

Reviews.Title: Yup.  The Battery Door
Reviews.Author: Jennifer S
Reviews.Content: Same problem as many other reviewers.  Within a couple of days of giving the camera to my daugher for her birthday, the battery door would not latch.  Every time she picked up the camera to use it, the batteries dropped to the floor.  We weren't even able to use it long enough to know if it was a good camera.  I returned it to the retailer and told them it was defective merchandise, and fortunately for us, they took it back without any hassle.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but battery case clip broke on the first day
Reviews.Author: ginw
Reviews.Content: I sent this as a gift to my son, who is in an area where he can't return this item, so he has worked with it the best he can.  The first day he had it the battery case clip broke.  He says it takes good pictures and will do for him till he gets home.  So I can't say that I would really recommend this camera, I looked at a couple of forums, afterwards of course, and found that this is a common problem with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Limited range of ideal circumstances
Reviews.Author: S.K. Whang
Reviews.Content: I had been using the older version of Nikon's Coolpix and loving it. So when it came time for an upgrade, I figured it would be a no-brainer to go with the newer version of a proven product. Unfortunately, I found this model has a limited range of ideal circumstances when it will actually produce pictures of an acceptable quality.

Reviews.Title: A great gift
Reviews.Author: Jennifer E. Halsey "jensedhome"
Reviews.Content: We gave this camera as a gift.  It seems to be a good product.  The pictures are clear and it was easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: PJSolarz
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera at a good price. It's easy to use as like with any other electronic gadget; you use it a few times and you have it figured out

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use for photo shoots for my etsy. I read a bunch of reviews of different cameras and finally decided on this one. I've had it for about a year now and have only used it 3 or 4 times. It drains batteries within 20 minutes of turning it on which is insanely frustrating. This situation is made worse by the fact that it takes at least 20 minutes to get one useable photo. All in all I am very disappointed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: artgirl777
Reviews.Content: Great camera. My husband loves it. I have a Nikon DSLR and this little cam takes excellent pix. It also does a great job in low light situations! Outstanding for the price! WTG Nikon!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Erica H
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her new camera I got it for her for Christmas she had a different brand she but when she zoomed in all the way the pictures would come out  really burley with this one they don't. I have a big one the SLR & I love it so much as well so that's why I bought this brand for her!!

Reviews.Title: Battery Door Latch Problem - Me Too
Reviews.Author: ddmsf1 "ddmsf1"
Reviews.Content: I rarely leave a negative review for a product but I am particularly disappointed with the rediculous construction of my Nikon CoolPix [in my case L22] battery door latch as I bought my Nikon for the historic reputation for quality of cameras bearing that name. Unfortunately I did not take endurance into account.After 10 months of use, as others have been reviewing, the door to the battery compartment on my Nikon Coolpix also unexpectedly fell open and as with other reviews I found myself on my hands and knees looking for the batteries. This began to happen with increasing frequency, until, as with others, I finally had to tape the door shut.My decision to turn to taping the door occurred on the night I was on the roof of a hotel, in pitch dark, attempting to take photos and video of 2012 News Years Eve fireworks in San Francisco. You have my permission to laugh here: In scrambling around in the dark, grabbing for anything the shape of a AA battery I nearly fell down a fire escape opening in the roof!My New Year's resolution is to check to assure that the reviews I read were written more than 48 hours after the product was received! Having survived "the tape holding your glasses together" generational teasing, I'm going replace my taped Nikon with another brand of camera.

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality is not great
Reviews.Author: M. Griffin
Reviews.Content: I received this camera for Xmas and was very excited. Once I started taking photos I began to get really disappointed in the quality. If someone was not sitting perfectly still the picture would come out blurry. I was using the easy auto mode at this point. Considering my children (all in grade school) put their money together to buy this I kept taking pictures of everything everywhere on every setting trying to figure out what was the best setting for where. But if something important came up I would go back to my 7 year old 6.1 mega pixel Kodak easy share.The problem was it took too long to focus and if the subject moved it would not turn out right, similar to some cell phone cameras. Other pictures included flash when not needed an no flash when it was needed. It does have multiple scenes to play around with, but the average person will want to pull out their camera and press a button when their child is sliding down a slide or walking for the first time. Rather than turning it on, And choosing menu options thus possibly missing the shot.Upon researching the camera and finding out about the probable battery door problem, I decided to return it.

Reviews.Title: The len does not Open
Reviews.Author: Iris
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x NIKKOR Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD (Black)I have this  camera for about a week. I took 10 photos and after that the lens  can not open .I changed batteries remove card but it seem like a mechanical defect.

Reviews.Title: Good First Camera
Reviews.Author: ReviewerDave
Reviews.Content: Wanted a decent first camera at a low enough price point for my 11 year old daughter to start out with. We weren't disappointed and she has really enjoyed it. She has been able to take some good pictures using the automatic settings, yet the camera has enough extra features for her to learn more as time goes on.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: chinese13
Reviews.Content: This camera, is a good start for beginners in photography. It is easy to navigate the different settings. But can be slow between a taken picture and taking another picture. When doing very close up objects less than half a foot away it can take a long time to focus in on you subject. Over all it is an amateur's camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Holt
Reviews.Content: Great camera...takes good pictures, very reliable.  It was so good that I bought my a daughter one for her own on christmas.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole Ramey
Reviews.Content: Everyone in my family has a Nikon Coolpix of some sort, they are all different models. Those cameras are all pretty nice, this camera is terrible. over half the photos I take are blurry and just like everyone else the battery door won't stay closed.

Reviews.Title: Broken battery door in a week! Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: SSHRE "SSHRE"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely horrendous expirience with this camera!!! I was about to take a picture of my kids, 5yo and 3yo, the camera turned off and I felt the batteries on my feet. Since then, it can not keep batteries in the compartment!!! Do I have to walk and take pictures around with Nikon  camera with taped battery compartment? If you want to waste your money, go ahead and buy it, but I recommend: DO NOT buy this camera! Very surprised and disappointed with Nikon!!!

Reviews.Title: nikon point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Julie A. Smart
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because it was a nikon and in the price range we wanted to spend.  I believe it will be a great camera, however I was disappointed that it did not come with a battery and charger.  We bought another brand for less and it came with one.  Other than that, I suspect it will serve its purpose well for our 10 year old son.

Reviews.Title: A Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Perry L. Radford "PLRadford"
Reviews.Content: Whatever you do, do not buy anything that says, "Nikon Coolpix".  I purchased one for almost $300.00.  Within one year it started shutting off.  I had to fight Nikon to get it to work.  They finally gave me a newer and supposedly better one.  This Christmas while taking family pictures, the newer and better one suddenly went blank, the zoom lens got stuck in out-mode and hasn't worked since.  This is a piece of junk.  I am about to investigate buying a nice Canon.

Reviews.Title: not complete
Reviews.Author: mrgrunt
Reviews.Content: camera shipped without a memory cardNikon Coolpix S220 10MP Digital Camera with 3x  Optical Zoom and 2.5 inch LCD (Plum)not ready to use  not rite  ill  never buy from amazon again

Reviews.Title: Slow to Shoot & Chancy to Focus
Reviews.Author: Frederick Shellman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an old CyberShot. I use it almost every day and take an average of 30 to 50 images at least. I use it in a multitude of environments. With that being said I am extremely disappointed in this camera. I have had the focus "fail" in a landscape/distance environment every time I have used it. The shutter is slow to react. Sometimes it makes a shutter type noise and some times it does not. I do not care how many megapixels a camera has if the quality of the resulting image is questionable and cannot be depended upon. I am going to replace it as soon as I can rationalize the $90.00 expenditure as a loss.

Reviews.Title: nikon camera
Reviews.Author: DS
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new camera. I recently went to my daughter's in North Carolina and all my children and grandchildren were there. I got to use the camera a lot. They also have a new puppy. The camera is easy to use and takes great pictures. I would highly reccommend this camera.  DS

Reviews.Title: Lasted only one year....waste of money!!!
Reviews.Author: Onika Edwards
Reviews.Content: I had problems with this camera from beginning to end. It finally died last week with a bright white light! yes it went into the light, the entire screen went white and could no longer take pics. I knew it was gonna die from the white lines that kept appearing across the screen till it finally went all together. Please save your money, it's cute to look at but is an utter waste, highly disappointed! Nikon please take this camera off the market and reassess the quality of your product!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: having some troubles
Reviews.Author: Harold R. Skinner "weaver587"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife, to replace an ailing Sony digital...could possibly be not yet used to this camera, but it seems to be somewhat "off" in the exposures; she hasn't yet gotten a good set of pictures (nor consistant exposures) no matter what settings she uses on the camera. Using the flash seems to be inconsistant as well...Haven't tried Nikon support, so they may have some answers. The manual for the camera is on a DVD, which makes it difficult to reference "in the field" which is when you need it most, especially with a new camera, and it doesn't seem to explain the various settings very well... Have to rate it a 3 until we get some answers....

Reviews.Title: NIkon Coolpix is very easy to learn to use
Reviews.Author: Chris Horton "chrishrn"
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my 85 year old Mother and one for myself. We both find them very easy to use and Mom is having a ball with hers.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied with this product
Reviews.Author: Rafael Del Rosario Adames
Reviews.Content: First time I tried a Nikon product and I got very disappointed. No clear and poor quality pictures day and night.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L24 camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Outside photos are nice.  However, we have taken very few acceptable indoor photos.  Most are blurry/out of focus.  We have tried various settings to no avail.  Access to batteries and memory card is not user friendly.  I know Nikon is considered to be a good camera but I wish I had done more research prior to purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: towanda1189
Reviews.Content: I just got my camera today and had a chance to play with it a little bit, this camera is awesome, the picture is so clear and vivid, so clear you can see every line and wrinkle without zooming in, well that wasn't a good example but it's true, all your pictures have character to them. like all Nikon coolpix cameras it's easy to operate esp if your a beginner, I've had a coolpix camera before so I just jumped right in as far as operating it goes. For all you beginners out there I've found nikon camera's to be one of the best brands out there for not to much money. I recommend everyone try one of there camera's

Reviews.Title: SIMPLE DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I wanted a simple to use digital camera. This camera meets that need. i was a little disappointed the the very limited number of picture is would hold w/o a card - something like 7.

Reviews.Title: I liked my L18 better
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: Nice 14 MP camera for the money but... The L18 I had before seemed a little more rugged, the data connection was on the side so you could stand the camera up when downloading to the computer.  The door for the battery/SD card seems a little frail on the L24. The L24 doesn't return to a default setting.  If you set it to no flash and macro, that's what it is when you power it up again.  I liked the L18 that powered up to a default setting that was constant instead of having to check each time.  Too bad my L18 got dropped in a lake or I would still be using it.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mother, who wanted a very simple, inexpensive digital camera. As expected, she hardly uses it, but she had little trouble learning it, and it takes reasonably good photos.

Reviews.Title: Great for anyone as gift or just for yourself.
Reviews.Author: Tina Latham
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for my 16 year old.  The ease of this camera is great, put batteries in and start snapping.  The pictures are great and for the price is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: My old camera broke and I needed one fast. Bought this one and I am so happy I did! It gives clear pictures and video. I like the way it is built also. It is very easy to use and not confusing at all! Overall nice camera, I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: so - so cool
Reviews.Author: Taiyda D. Chiapetta
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter age 12.  The camera has nice options and is easy to figure out.  She was overall happy with the camera.  Two things have been a bother:  it is sensitive to bumps and we're having difficulties with the cord to download pics onto the computer.  A bit disappointed.

Reviews.Title: something missing
Reviews.Author: greg
Reviews.Content: the Nikon camera is fine, just what I wanted at the kind of price I wanted to pay.However, it came without a manual...just a quick start pamphlet that keeps referring to themanual.  Now I have to figure out how trudge through the process of finding one.

Reviews.Title: Works fine for me!
Reviews.Author: Starz
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera on different occasions and it seems to work well for me. I had a few blurry pictures, but the lighting was also pretty bad where I was taking them. For the price it is a pretty reasonable camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - has all the basics!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Bowersox "FloridaGator1Card"
Reviews.Content: If a simple basic camera is what you're looking for, then this seems to be the one for you! It takes AA batteries which is actually a huge plus since you don't have to worry about charging batteries or re-chargeable batteries failing and not holding a charge after a while. Just make sure you carry plenty of spare AAs or you'll certainly be sorry!The only other drawback is the zoom, it's very limited. But this is still a basic simple camera, so you shouldn't really have high expectations on the zoom capability.It's a point and shoot type of camera, great for pics with friends, family, etc. Nothing over the top special.

Reviews.Title: very happy with this camera!
Reviews.Author: alcaery83
Reviews.Content: The only thing that was different than expected was the finish on the camera is flat instead of glossy but i still love it!! Takes great pics!

Reviews.Title: What a camera!
Reviews.Author: Andyjoe
Reviews.Content: I love this new Coolpix L24! ...easy to use and beautiful pictures! I expect that from Nikon though ...thank you,Andy Joe Stewart

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L24
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Vigil
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly and does not take good pics. I had a cheap Kodak that lasted almost 10 years till I dropped it and broke, that took way better pics and was easier to use.

Reviews.Title: What a disappointment!
Reviews.Author: Fred Heuer "Fab Four Fred"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my wife for a nice second camera. The Nikon name has always been a good indication of quality. Since buying it we have been really disappointed with the quality of the camera and the photos it took. We purchased it at Sam's Club for $99.00. We ended up returning it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: total garbage
Reviews.Author: SuperSnappp
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible. Pictures are average, it takes video but they are horrible quality upon playback. This camera takes double A batteries, but as other reviews have already mentioned the battery door is flimsy. This camera is MAYBE worth $60 maximum. Nikon is tarnishing their name with this camera. You don't see Canon putting out stuff this horrible. Avoid at all costs.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY A NIKON CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: The Nikon L24 has a defect which the company refuses to cover under their one year warranty. The battery door compartment breaks and the batteries fall out which makes it impossible to use. What is infuriating is that Nikon refuses to cover this problem under their one year warranty. I purchased the camera a few months ago in Dec 2011 and have the receipt as well as the original box & information pamphlets. They didn't seem to care and said it was not covered under the warranty. When I originally told them about the problem over the phone they said it was not a recall problem and acted like they had never even heard about the problem. I told them they should check all the internet postings regarding the battery door problems with this camera!!I also told them I will NEVER again buy a NIKON product and will make sure to tell EVERYBODY that Nikon does not stand behind their product. By the way, they said to send in the camera so they can evaluate it and let me know how much the repair would be. After looking at the internet postings I can see that by the time I send it in and pay for the repair I could almost buy a new camera! My husband is a lawyer and looking into a class action suit. It is not the money anymore, it is the principle!  DO NOT BUY A NIKON CAMERA!!

Reviews.Title: Battery Door Problem
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: The battery door will not stay closed. This is a BIG problem!Batteries fall out when not in use and fall out while trying to make pictures. Not happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Defective Battery Door!!!
Reviews.Author: F.E. Alberts
Reviews.Content: As has been stated in many other reviews out here this product has a major flaw in its battery door.  I like many others purchased this product only to find that the battery door would not remain closed after just 3 months of use.  I also sent this in to Nikon for evaluation for repair under warranty only to be told that it would not be covered.  I on the other hand received an estimate of $105.37 to repair it.  I spent $82.00 on the camera.  I surly would not spend another $105 to repair it.  It is clear to me that Nikon has no intention of supporting this product.  It is clear to me that with all the complaints I have seen here and other places that this is a design flaw in their camera.  Needles to say I am looking for a new camera.  Also needles to say Nikon will not be on the list for a replacement as their warranty is not worth the paper it is written on.  Shame on you Nikon, and Buyer Beware.Continued...  I asked Nikon to send back my camera they said that they could do that and said they were sorry that I was not satisfied that my camera would cost so much to repair and tried to explain why.  They then said it showed signs of physical damage and had a broken screen.  It fine when I sent it in and I told them so.  They then sent me pictures of the camera with the broken screen.... guess what it was not even my camera...  I responded back to the about that and I have not heard from them in over a week.  Their site says they will get back within 24 hours....  I think I have been sent into a black hole.  we have had several emails over the last month but I am getting nowhere.

Reviews.Title: A Lemon Camera with no Corporate Backing
Reviews.Author: Jim White
Reviews.Content: After my experience with this model, I cannot in good faith recommend this camera or any Nikon product to anybody. I purchased the Coolpix L24 digital camera (red) for approximately $100 at a Wal-Mart in Greenville, SC in October 2011. It looked sharp and had a lot of nice features and I thought it to be a wise and economical purchase. However, when I actually started using it, I noticed that it had some problems that I was willing to overlook. (unfortunately none were within the 15-day return limit at Wal-Mart) The delay on the actual picture (time between snapping and capturing image was a little long in my opinion) and the zoom feature had issues - worked about 3/4 time. However, the final straw for me was on a trip to Tennessee in April 2012. While trying to capture family pictures of my wife's relatives (most of whom I hadn't ever met), the camera inexplicably stopped working. The lcd screen turned black and left an incoherent image on the screen. Since the camera was only 7 months old and had a 12-month warranty, I hoped that Nikon would make it right and either repair it free or refund my money. (I was hoping for the latter). Unfortunately, neither happened. After sending the camera in to Nikon, I received a letter back saying it was not covered under warranty and would be $105 to fix. After sounding off to the service number (800) 645-6678 about the poor quality of the camera (I was not happy that the invoice was trying to blame me saying it was caused by impact damage), he gave me another number to call (631) 547-4200, which led me to (800) 645-6687. After wasting 20 minutes talking to outsourced customer service - a conversation where the representative repeatedly tried to tell me to send my camera in to be fixed (if they listen to the recording - I think I made it abundantly clear 3 or 4 times that is exactly what I did). I'm not sure it ever registered to him that i found it absurd for them to expect me to pay $105 to repair a lemon camera. I also told him and the other representative not to ship it back to me. The second rep actually said it was free and couldn't understand why I didn't want it shipped back. Do people actually think stuff is free? I was looking out for their bottom line (i'm a CPA). In the end, the 2nd representative said he would email my complaint to management on Monday. The bottom line here is that if you are willing to settle for a camera that will only last 7 months and break, have issues from the getgo, not be honored under the warranty, and have to call about several different numbers to complain without really gettting service, then this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L24
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: This is my sixth Nikon camera purchase and I must say I am very disappointed.  While the camerea works properly the real problem is in the packaging.  Upon arrival I opened the box, assembled the strp, batteries and found out at this time there was no memory card.  A memory card cost to the manufacturer is probably in the pennies range, yet they chose not to include one, basicly making an exciting purchase a big disappointment.  Since a digital camera without a memory card is simply a hunk of metal and plastic, this camera is worthless out of the box.  You must purchase a memory card separately.I simply believe this is poor marketing.  Yes, I suppose if you read what is part of the package and make assumptions of what is not, you will see thee is no memory card included.  I could also make the assumption that there is no underwatercase included, no 2 year photography training included, no dinner for two or a host of other accessories, no memory card is not one I would make.  Buy another camera, any other camera.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: GavinRay
Reviews.Content: I have had a Nikon Coolpix camera for a little under a year, and it has been nothing but problems. From the beginning, the touch screen has been most difficult, flipping through pictures in the opposite direction then my finger says, or just not working at all. I've missed many good shots because of its incompetence.I must say, the video quality is great on this little thing. Although I mainly wanted it for still shots, and those come out blurry most of the time.Now, about Ten months after I bought the camera, it has stopped charging when I plug it in. The output slot has stopped working, so I cannot hook it to my computer at all. Basically, the Camera is a piece of garbage now.For 100 bucks, this camera is NOT WORTH IT!I repeat, DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: No more Nikons
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly because I heard that Nikon was such a great company. But after using 1 time and taking maybe 10 photos. The next time I took it out of the carring case the LCD screen was white. I sent it in for repair under warrenty and Nikon says that the LCD is not covered under warrenty, but will fix it for 15% more then it cost to buy another one new. So I will no longer use, buy, nor recommend Nikon to any body I know.

Reviews.Title: battery door!
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Everything is said! Also I have problems with battery door!The speed to record the pictures is slow.The image quality of the picture is goodVideo quality is poor

Reviews.Title: Battery compartment problems, like everyone else
Reviews.Author: KarateGirl258
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, my camera is just as broken as everyone else's. The battery compartment spring is WAY too strong, thus breaking the latch, so now it doesn't stay closed at all. The only way to use it is to tape it shut. However, since it drains battery power like nobody's business, you're constantly peeling the tape, replacing batteries, then hunting around for the damned tape again to re-tape it. Also, the delay between pressing the button and the camera actually taking the picture is WAY too long for cameras of this day and age. I've missed out on too many good shots to count. This is a piece of junk. I wouldn't recommend it at all.

Reviews.Title: Good price, but it has no rechargable battery
Reviews.Author: Amie E. Limon
Reviews.Content: An affordable camara, good definition, good memory, nice siza, but it does not have a rechargable battery. Nikon camaras are always a good buy

Reviews.Title: Love this little baby
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these 3 weeks ago and it's friggin awesome. love the small size and the price per megapizels rocks. would definetly recomend to anybody based on the high res coupled with ease of use. it took my old memory cards too which is great because i didn't have  to go buy new ones. the LCD screen is big enough and its not so big as to drain the battery. very great product!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera, for awhile...
Reviews.Author: Jack Evans
Reviews.Content: This could have been the best compact camera that I have owned. It is easy to use and takes fantastic pictures. However, I have experienced the same problem with this camera that most everyone else who has purchased this has had, the battery compartment door. I am a mature person and I take really good care of my things, but during a recent vacation trip, the batteries just fell out. I found that the very tiny plastic tab that locks the battery compartment has broken off and it will no longer hold the batteries. I plan to use duct tape for awhile, but it makes me very leery about purchasing other Nikon products.  Not because the are lacking in fantastic performance, but because the mechanical design is so poorly though out. I will shop to replace this camera, but it will be with a Canon or other maker, not Nikon.

Reviews.Title: POS camera
Reviews.Author: Sally A Schnakenberg
Reviews.Content: When the bad reviews outnumber the good ones, you know there is a problem.It's the battery cover, folks.When you retrieve the camera from your pocket to take a 'once in a lifetime' photo and the batteries remain in your pocket, you know it's a POS.Even worse, your daughter is learning how to swim, and you grab the camera and the batteries fall into the pool."Honey, can you swim down and get those two batteries"?So what's the solution?Drill a hole for a screw? No, not enough plastic,Put a piece of tape over the door to hold it closed? No, it'll get messy over time with all that tape replacement.The best thing? Krazy Glue the door shut and when the batteries die, throw the camera away and get another brand of camera, never buying anything from Nikon again.

Reviews.Title: Yes, ANOTHER Battery Door Issue
Reviews.Author: Enat
Reviews.Content: I was arrogant enough to believe that Nikon would have corrected the battery door issues with so many complaints but, alas, I am on here to say I was wrong and have been affected by this recurring problem. I owned my camera just 8 short months before the battery door would not stay closed. I sent it back to the manufacturer where they repaired it. I thought it would be great from then on. I was wrong again. Just 6 months later, 2 months after my warranty expired, the battery door broke AGAIN! Now they tell me it'll be cheaper for me to buy a new camera than to have it repaired. I am so ticked off I have had this piece of junk camera for less than 1.5 years and it's now trash. Do NOT waste your money. Do not buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Terrible waste of money
Reviews.Author: r Jacob
Reviews.Content: Even though it wasn't expensive it was a shame to spend even a penny on something that never worked. I also thought it was just my camera but now I see it wasn't. Do not buy

Reviews.Title: DO NOT Recommend!!!
Reviews.Author: seattlepug
Reviews.Content: I've never written any reviews.  So take this seriously, someone who doesn't like to complain like me HAVE TO tell you about this camera.  This camera is good for taking some steady items like statues, outside, under daylight, but ONLY in the condition.  I've never be able to take any of my dogs, kids, or indoor pictures with this camera.  It takes forever to focus, yet the pictures are very blurry.  Then it takes forever to process the photos, so you have to wait for a while to check what you took.  I haven't had the buttery door problem like other reviewers yet, but I am not happy at all with this camera.

Reviews.Title: What A Shame
Reviews.Author: Paul L.
Reviews.Content: The battery door design flaw on this camera ruined my photo experiences.The battery door latch area broke early on after purchasing this camera. Before it broke I was able to take many fine quality photos in all modes. After the battery door broke and had to be closed using rubber bands, I had difficulty taking the same quality photos. It was frustrating because some photo sessions worked well, but then the battery door would not stay closed and the photos began coming out yellowish. Also, recently the shutter would not stay open completely. I went through so many bateries because of the flaw. I enjoyed this camera for a few months, then had so many problems I started looking for a new camera. There needs to be a recall on this product to keep me interested in another Nikon product.

Reviews.Title: Broke on the second use -- Beware of Nikon
Reviews.Author: J. Jensen
Reviews.Content: I bought this because our Canon digital SLR was too large to take on vacation with us.  Decided a cheap, little camera would do.  Since we were going to the Caribbean, I opted for one with batteries that I could purchase anywhere (AAs that is to say).  On our very first day in port the camera stopped working.  The len door would not extend and retract properly.  Before you say "he must have used this in the sand and that caused the issue", we were on a bus tour, shooting through the open air window.  We used our iPhones for the rest of the trip (grainy and terrible, but worked).  I was so discussed with this product that I came home and threw it in the junk drawer simply because I don't want to deal with Nikon.  Perhaps I will do something about it soon, whilst there is still value in a refund.

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: Our agency bought these a little over a year ago and about 75% of the cameras have battery issues. The screen says "battery exhausted" and the camera will just stop taking a charge. At first, we didnt realize the severity of the issue, so we just started buying replacement batteries from Buy.com for about $7.00 a piece. The new batteries seem to work for about a month or two and then eventually they all do the exact same thing again. We bought about 40 cameras and it seems like everyday a new camera keeps going bad. We have replaced about 30 out of the 40 camera batteries, most more than once. I wish that we realized how bad the situation was with these cameras before the warrenty ran out. We were able to send 3 in before the warrenty ran out and Nikon sent us new cameras in return.

Reviews.Title: Another Battery Door failure not covered by warranty
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: 7/26  Trollling around the internet, my wife discovered "Ask a Nikon Support Question, Get an answer ASAP" at Justanswer.comAfter describing the problem we have experienced with our battery compartment door latch, but we before the message, Nikon informed us that we would be charged $16 for the answer.WE ARE SO DONE WITH NIKON.  FOREVER.=========================================================================7/25  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS CAMERA.  IT IS POORLY DESIGNED AND THE BATTERY DOOR WILL BREAK.I sent this email to Nikon customer service today in response to their denial of any warranty responsibility for a broken battery door on my NINE-MONTH-OLD COOLPIX L24 camera:=================================================================================Dear Sir:I have just discussed my Nikon COOLPIX L24 camera with a customer service representative at the 800 number found in my attached email from your service center.I am disgusted on two counts:1.  Your customer service representative told me that the L24 and L22 cameras in your service center have never experienced this problem.  I challenge you to go to any on-line customer review and look at the number of instances where this exact failure has been noted.  Your representative acknowledged that breakage of the battery door has been complained about many times in the past,  Despite this, Nikon denies that there is a problem. because none of the cameras in the service center have ever experienced battery door failure.  When I purchased this camera nine months ago, I read all of these reviews and told myself that I was a careful camera-user.  I  assumed that that everyone else must be mishandling their camera, but this is apparently not the case since my camera broke on its own inside my shirt pocket.2.  I was told that the warranty does not cover breakage.  Isn't this convenient that the problem is one of breakage of a poorly designed plastic part and your warranty denies any responsibility?Despite this, I was tempted to pay the $29 service charge to have my camera fixed.  But when told that I would have to pay an additional $15 for return shipping, I told your customer service representative to keep my camera:  $29 + $15 = half of what I paid for the camera originally.===========================email received from Nikon Service Center===========================From: Nikon Inc. Customer Service [...]Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 12:30 PMSubject: Nikon Service Acknowledgement/EstimateDear Nikon Photo Service Customer:We have received your COOLPIX L24 (RED) and entered it into our system as service order number XXXXXXX .If your service order indicates the product is covered under the terms of the warranty, no further action is necessary. If your product is not covered by the warranty, you will need to approve the attached estimate.  Non-warranty service requires approval before we can begin work. To view the service status or approve a service estimate, please enter our service website through the following link [...] . Please be aware a this data has just been entered, it takes up to 30 minutes after you receive this email for it to be viewable on our website. To view your service details, please use your service order number XXXXXXX and your "Bill-to" name.......Should you require any assistance with this service, you may email us through our service website at [...] or call us at 800/645-6678. We look forward to returning your equipment quickly and in good working order. We appreciate your business.Sincerely,Nikon Photo Service Department

Reviews.Title: lost batteries
Reviews.Author: R. L. Mallory
Reviews.Content: I have this been using this camera for several month, it takes great pictues, easy to use, but the battery compartment will not stay CLOSED. No matter where it is the battery cover will come open, you lose the batteries. Thankfully they are just AA, and cheap.

Reviews.Title: Bought today, returning tomorrow
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: My wife has been asking for a simple video camera for quite awhile.  After reading complaints repeatedly listing a weak battery door and Nikon's poor customer service, I am returning the Nikon Coolpix L-24 I bought her today.  I don't think Nikon deserves my business if they treat other customers so poorly.  Apparently Nikon Quality Control is no longer what it used to be and the number of complaints I've seen is statistically way too high. I'll checkout what Canon offers instead.

Reviews.Title: If You want Battery Operated camera then Buy It
Reviews.Author: Prakash
Reviews.Content: Good one If You want Battery Operated camera on Cheap Money...Picture Quality is not that good its better to have sony in the Digital cameras

Reviews.Title: Horrible Photo Quality
Reviews.Author: Brandon van Niekerk
Reviews.Content: I did not buy this camera, thank goodness.  But my work did, and we use it often to take photos during events.  The picture quality is the worst I've seen on any camera.  Grainy, and blurry, no matter what you do.  I can't believe it is supposed to be 14 megapixel.  I would definitely recommend NOT buying this camera, it is quite useless and not fun at all to use.

Reviews.Title: Bad battery door design.
Reviews.Author: GW MBA Student "GW MBA Student"
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine, if you can keep the batteries in it after the very fragile tab, that locks the battery compartment door, breaks after normal use.

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: Ali Aitken
Reviews.Content: The camera is for someone other than a kid. If it is thrown around in bags and whatnot, it is not your type of camera. If it is taken care of this is pprobably for you.

Reviews.Title: Good relation price-quality
Reviews.Author: RICARDO ARCE SANDI
Reviews.Content: I consider that this camera have a good relation with price-quality and its size is ideal for carry to any place.

Reviews.Title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: jim Justusson
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCTI would have given it NO stars, but it won't let me!  My daughter used it twice.  The camera will NOT work at all.  We replaced the batteries and it still won't power up.  I've been online and it looks like this happens to many people.  STAY AWAY from this camera. I have a cannon and it's worked with NO problems for 3 yrs.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughters birthday, it was the one she wanted because of the features and the size makes it great for on the go.

Reviews.Title: No no no
Reviews.Author: Shopper29
Reviews.Content: I did not like this. It took way to long to take a picture. it is not good for kids. It looks pretty and has alot of options

Reviews.Title: Camera gift for kids
Reviews.Author: Ballet Lover "Ellen"
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to each of my twin grandsons on turning nine.  They are so happy and snapping away!

Reviews.Title: Picture Mode
Reviews.Author: barkat
Reviews.Content: The Camera does not set to the Picture Mode as I want. Perhaps the Instructions are not clear or there is some manufacturing defect. What ever it is, it is not working for me.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: pen name
Reviews.Content: i love this camera i can take it to school take pics and do anything thx for lestin blah ats

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: SarahDJ
Reviews.Content: I really like my Nikon Coolpix camera. I'm not sure what version I have, I just know I've had it a LONG time. It has never failed me, it takes great pictures, and it has taken quite a few knocks! Even after all this time (and several vacations later) the battery life lasts and lasts. I don't have to worry about packing the charger. I have nothing bad to say!

Reviews.Title: picture taking
Reviews.Author: Michael S., Preston
Reviews.Content: It's a great little camera, easy to use and easy to take in purse anywhere.  Takes wonderful pictures and I would reckamend it to peolpe who like an easly used camera...  thanks Gloria

Reviews.Title: COOL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Georgina Creveling
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT CAMERA THAT TAKES MARVELOUS PICTURES.THE BEST I HAVE EVER TAKEN.MY FAMILY THINKS I HAVE HAD LESSONS LOL

Reviews.Title: even like the color
Reviews.Author: Howard L. Greenberg
Reviews.Content: What a great camera, easy of use and set up. the 3 inch LCD is great zoom  this camera has everything the Big one have and yet so inexpensive

Reviews.Title: not so good at night
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: great with daylight, and either really dark redish color pictures or super bright with flash at night,,, its interesting that nikon hasn't figured it out yet.same problem with the older models.disappointed.R

Reviews.Title: Carol
Reviews.Author: Mrs. M "Carol"
Reviews.Content: We consider this Nikon Coolpix L24 to be among the very best cameras we ever owned. We have had other brands but find the Nikon Coolpix the best bang for our buck. Simple to use and great pictures. Each member of our household owns a Nikon and loves it. I can't say enough about how great Amazon is, we receive outstanding service and do a great deal  of  purchasing with them. Service, dependability and response is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Fine camera.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J. Ganz "cookbook diva"
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap, simple, point and shoot camera.  It does what it was asked to do.  We're happy.

Reviews.Title: So-So Camera
Reviews.Author: Kelly Novak "kellynova"
Reviews.Content: We got this camera to easily take pictures on vacation and at parties.  Pictures are not so great.  Other people will take pictures as the same event and theirs are excellent, or we use our other camera, same thing.  This is hard to find the right setting and the pictures just aren't that great.

Reviews.Title: The most blurry camera I have ever seen!
Reviews.Author: Alexia
Reviews.Content: All the pictures are blurry, whether it is in the night (which I understand for a cheap camera like this) but also in the day, with the sun etc!!!DO NOT BUY !

Reviews.Title: Great pictures horrible interface with Windows
Reviews.Author: Nickels
Reviews.Content: Well I love this camera for the pictures it takes, but the software is useless. I have spent countless hours trying to get images to download from the camera to Windows 7 via the included software and USB cable with no success. I've owned several digital cameras, but I've never had this much issue getting pictures to download. I am going to end up buying a card reader to use for downloading pictures.Nikon's image transfer software hoovers and inhales.

Reviews.Title: Can't charge anymore. It's dead.
Reviews.Author: Lei Yang "Meilin"
Reviews.Content: Only used for one year. Can't charge any more. Poor quality. It's cheep but they earned bad name. No more Nikon any more.

Reviews.Title: Mine died just over a year
Reviews.Author: Howard Burroughs "Hounddog"
Reviews.Content: Just over a year and the battery dies in no time....I lost a bunch of pictures...I went to turn it on and there was nothing...Really dead..I charged it and was dead the next day...I used this camera 5 times in one year on trips and it is dead....The worst thing is I lost 40 pics.....Well my old cannon still works will go back to that and will never ever buy another coolpix camera.....

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX L24 14 MP DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Schlumpf "adventure reader"
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a Christmas gift, and has not been put into service as yet.  I and my Grandaughter both have the L22 model of this camera, and we are quite satisfied with them.

Reviews.Title: Sassafras
Reviews.Author: MarieDeeds
Reviews.Content: I have not really been able to read about or operate the phone.  I have been busy.  But I am looking forward to it.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Jerry B. Andrews "AU"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for a vacation trip.  Used it for four days and the camera froze on me.  When I turn it on, the image in the LCD looks like a bullet has been shot through it and it just clicks.  When I called Nikon technical services they suggested that I take the batteries and storage device from the camera for 24 hours.  Still on vacation, four more days remaining and I do not have a working camera.  Can't wait to return it to Amazon and believe me, I will stear clear of Nikon products in the future.  Bummer of vacation when photos can't be made to remember scenery.Nikon COOLPIX L24 14 MP Digital Camera with 3.6x NIKKOR Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD (Silver)

Reviews.Title: I am new and Amazon is user friendly
Reviews.Author: DazyDeb
Reviews.Content: Hi,  I am very new to Amazon and it has been an amazing experience, I placed an order and had to cancel and it was handled so great Thank You and well everything that has been purchased until now has been wonderful... The sellers and the shipping are both lightening fast... Thanks Amazon and the great sellers... See ya soon

Reviews.Title: Very Good!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Fedak "Kathryn Fedak"
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old daughter was looking for a not so expensive but good camera. This camera takes amazing pictures!!!!! She was very happy with the quality!!

Reviews.Title: Packages
Reviews.Author: Davas
Reviews.Content: My main concern that I have been expressing all the time is that my packaging is always too large. Please packages this item as small as possible. Thanks for your kind services.

Reviews.Title: OK camera; it functions as described; fine as secondary camera;
Reviews.Author: BK BAZHE "writer, poet, & artist."
Reviews.Content: It is ok; functions well; takes nice picture; good for second camera;Not incredibly well made; mediocre design and style; Good fortaking same boring family events and ordinary people faces,and scenes; Not for expensive vacations or events; likemost of garbage from china - is not made to last-long;

Reviews.Title: unimpressed
Reviews.Author: txmustang
Reviews.Content: The menu is clumsy.  The owner's manual is uninformative.  It is slow to respond.  For the money, there are much better cameras available.
